website_summaries.verdict: Though this hard plastic, posable doll is on the pricey side, Dobby is a must-have for dedicated Harry Potter fans and collectors of Harry Potter merchandise.
pros: Intricate intricate detail on features that replicate the Dobby character perfectly
Easy to pose, as the parts are movable
Perfect for posing on desks, tables, bookcases, shelves, and more
cons: The doll is about 12.5 inches tall, but some owners wish it was a bit larger
Expensive compared to other Harry Potter series dolls

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well made, so life like.
customer_reviews.text: The size is an in credible 12.5" tall and very well constructed. Sure to be the next valuable Harry Potter Dobby collectible.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara lynch

customer_reviews.title: ❤️❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: Life-like-dobby😆 Buying another ! Forget the elf on the shelf! This is the real deal! My 3yo believes he’s a Christmas elf who comes to life when he sleeps! Best ever!!!!
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: You might need a stand; the one I got is a little tipsy.
customer_reviews.text: Dobby lists to the right and needs a stand. Used as kitchen decor, can “help” in various places around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Vada

customer_reviews.title: Sweet stuff
customer_reviews.text: Harry Potter fans will love this figure. He sits in my house next to the talking hat and my set of Harry Potter books.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it and in amazing shape fast shipping also.
customer_reviews.author: amberpratt

customer_reviews.title: Dobby lives!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present for my brother and he loves it. I was also really impressed with the likeness and durability of it. It was quite a bit larger than I thought it would be but that made it all the better.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Kinda small for the cost but the face is spot on.
customer_reviews.text: I think this product is WAY over priced. I paid $40+ for this, and it's basically just a plastic toy with a rag on it. Yes, I am a huge Harry Potter fan. Don't get me wrong, but it's pretty small and like i said, nothing special in the way it was made. I think $20 would have been more accurate. But, it is cool and it does look very real in the face, so, you be the judge.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: It's really cool and great for a Harry Potter fan. The only thing I can say badly about it is that the omly protection it had was plastic wrap. It came wrapped in plastic wrap. No box or anything. But it was still a cute toy.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Walsh

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this doll
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my husband because he gets a kick out of the Harry Potter stuff. He says it is perfect, he has him overlooking him working.
customer_reviews.author: Rescue Connie

customer_reviews.title: Smaller from what i thought
customer_reviews.text: Way smaller then what I imagine but worth it for the details and material its made of. Arms and leg move so you can pose it a bit but i do love it. Just wish it was way bigger.
customer_reviews.author: maria terriquez

customer_reviews.title: A bit too expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Is it cute? Yes. Is it fun for Harry Potter lovers? Yes. Is it small and expensive? Yes.
customer_reviews.author: Jobeth Stanfill

customer_reviews.title: I have a house elf!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice addition to my Harry Potter collection. Looks fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Lander

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love Dobby. I put him on my desk to hang out. Looks just like him. My grandkids gave him a sock. Lol!
customer_reviews.author: dgibz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love love love..... was used for decoration for my daughters baby shower as well as the nursery a very well made Dobby, and good price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: He is perfect , like elf on shelf he moves around the house
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Bermingham

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter love this doll, she is such a Harry Potter fan.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina bendzsa

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love him! Wish they made a bigger version but I’m happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome collectible
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom at Christmas, which she is a really big Harry Potter fan it looks amazing
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Not good quality and not realistic. We had bought one of these type dolls at Universal Orlando. We bought this one as a replacement. Nothing like the original doll.
customer_reviews.author: AdvancedProTrainer LLC

customer_reviews.title: the key to happiness
customer_reviews.text: the best thing you’ll ever buy, no cap. he’s absolutely perfect and likes to wear tiny sweaters
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Dobby is great!
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my mother and she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Trevar

customer_reviews.title: So realistic
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our Harry Potter tree. Wish I had gotten him a long time ago to go with all of my HP items. Just love Dobby and he is so realistic!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Williamson

customer_reviews.title: So Realistic Looking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Grandma because she absolutely adores him in Harry Potter and she is factuacted with how realistic he looks. She sat him right next to where she sleeps.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice and really nice detail. My daughter loves it...
customer_reviews.author: Tammy F Bohannon

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: Great, but at Universal Studio LA I bought for 23.99
customer_reviews.author: Alex

product_meta.title: Wizarding World of Harry Potter 12 Dobby House Elf Poseable Doll Action Figure
product_meta.description:
Exclusive item from the Wizarding World at Universal Studios theme park. Acquire your very own house elf with this posable 12 inch Dobby figure. 

 Made of hard PVC rubber. Has areal fabric tunic just like in the film series. Hand-painted details and poseable limbs. Measures 12.5 inches in height and 5.75 inches in width
feature_bullets: Exclusive item from the Wizarding World at Universal Studios theme park
Acquire your very own house elf with this posable 12 inch Dobby figure
Made of hard PVC rubber. Has areal fabric tunic just like in the film series.
Hand-painted details and poseable arms and legs.
Measures 12.5 inches in height and 5.75 inches in width

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars107 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
